Package au.csiro.pathling

Class QueryHelpers

  • java.lang.Object
    • au.csiro.pathling.QueryHelpers
  • public abstract class QueryHelpers
extends Object
    Common functionality for executing queries using Spark.
    Author:
    John Grimes

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static class  QueryHelpers.DatasetWithColumn
      Represents a Dataset along with a Column that can be used to refer to one of the columns within.
      static class  QueryHelpers.DatasetWithColumnMap
      Represents a Dataset along with a map between two sets of columns.
      static class  QueryHelpers.JoinType
      Represents a type of join that can be made between two Dataset objects.

      QueryHelpers()

      • createColumn

        @Nonnull
public static QueryHelpers.DatasetWithColumn createColumn​(@Nonnull
                                                          Dataset<Row> dataset,
                                                          @Nonnull
                                                          Column column)
        Adds to the columns within a Dataset with an aliased version of the supplied column.
        Parameters:
        dataset - the Dataset on which to perform the operation
        column - a new Column
        Returns:
        a new Dataset, along with the new column name, as a QueryHelpers.DatasetWithColumn

      • createColumns

public static QueryHelpers.DatasetWithColumnMap createColumns​(@Nonnull
                                                              Dataset<Row> dataset,
                                                              @Nonnull
                                                              Column... columns)
        Adds to the columns within a Dataset with aliased versions of the supplied columns.
        Parameters:
        dataset - the Dataset on which to perform the operation
        columns - the new Column objects
        Returns:
        a new Dataset, along with the new column names, as a QueryHelpers.DatasetWithColumnMap

      • aliasAllColumns

        @Nonnull
public static QueryHelpers.DatasetWithColumnMap aliasAllColumns​(@Nonnull
                                                                Dataset<Row> dataset)
        Replaces all unaliased columns within a Dataset with new aliased columns.
        Parameters:
        dataset - the Dataset on which to perform the operation
        Returns:
        a new Dataset, with a mapping from the old columns to the new as a QueryHelpers.DatasetWithColumnMap

      • join

        @Nonnull
public static Dataset<Row> join​(@Nonnull
                                Dataset<Row> left,
                                @Nonnull
                                List<Column> leftColumns,
                                @Nonnull
                                Dataset<Row> right,
                                @Nonnull
                                List<Column> rightColumns,
                                @Nonnull
                                QueryHelpers.JoinType joinType)
        Join two datasets based on the equality of an arbitrary set of columns. The same number of columns must be provided for each dataset, and it is assumed that they are matched on their position within their respective lists.
        Parameters:
        left - the first Dataset
        leftColumns - the columns for the first Dataset
        right - the second Dataset
        rightColumns - the columns for the second Dataset
        joinType - the type of join to use
        Returns:
        the joined Dataset

      • join

        @Nonnull
public static Dataset<Row> join​(@Nonnull
                                Dataset<Row> left,
                                @Nonnull
                                Column leftColumn,
                                @Nonnull
                                Dataset<Row> right,
                                @Nonnull
                                Column rightColumn,
                                @Nonnull
                                QueryHelpers.JoinType joinType)
        Joins a Dataset to another Dataset, using the equality of two columns.
        Parameters:
        left - a Dataset
        leftColumn - the Column in the left Dataset
        right - another Dataset
        rightColumn - the column in the right Dataset
        joinType - a QueryHelpers.JoinType
        Returns:
        a new Dataset

      • join

        @Nonnull
public static Dataset<Row> join​(@Nonnull
                                Dataset<Row> left,
                                @Nonnull
                                Column leftColumn,
                                @Nonnull
                                Dataset<Row> right,
                                @Nonnull
                                Column rightColumn,
                                @Nonnull
                                Column additionalCondition,
                                @Nonnull
                                QueryHelpers.JoinType joinType)
        Joins a Dataset to another Dataset, using the equality of two columns.
        Parameters:
        left - a Dataset
        leftColumn - the Column in the left Dataset
        right - another Dataset
        rightColumn - the column in the right Dataset
        additionalCondition - an additional Column to be added to the join condition, using AND
        joinType - a QueryHelpers.JoinType
        Returns:
        a new Dataset

        a new Dataset
